title: Krieghoff
text:
H. Krieghoff <a href="GmbH">GmbH</a> is a German manufacturer of high-end <a href="hunting%20weapons">hunting</a> and <a href="shooting%20sport">sporting</a> firearms, based in <a href="Ulm">Ulm</a>, <a href="Germany">Germany</a>.
In <a href="North%20America">North America</a>n markets, their products are distributed via sister company Krieghoff International Inc., located in <a href="Ottsville%2C%20Pennsylvania">Ottsville, Pennsylvania</a>.
